overview:
Ben is a software development and engineering architect with 15 years of experience as both an individual contributor and director of product development teams. With deep and broad technical experiences, he has acted as a technical lead, systems architect, product manager, and development manager. His roles have been tactical (e.g., design, develop and implement full SDLC processes utilizing agile methodologies and continuous integration services) and strategic (e.g., leading company-wide initiatives on strategic planning and implementation).

He also has expertise in community building, open source software, licensure, and strategy.

  • Software Development Architecture & Management
  • Healthcare Information Technology & Implementation
  • IT Systems Design & Management
  • Open Source Software Strategy & Management
  • Online Community Building & Management
  • Pragmatic Product Management Certified
